name: org.wcdevs.blog.deployment-sequencer-lambda
description: An AWS Lambda function to make deployments of the resources associated to https://blog.wcdevs.org to AWS in a sequencial mode.

scripts.dist: npm run transpile && npm run zip
scripts.zip: cp -r node_modules dist/node_modules && cd dist && zip -r lambda.zip index.js node_modules

author: Asiel Leal Celdeiro
